title: Job Vacancies at Polaris Digitech Limited
content:
Polaris Digitech Limited is a Location Intelligence firm, providing data, software and decision support services to fulfill its client’s strategies and management needs through the development and deployment of Geographic Information Systems (GIS).

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Mobile App Developer - Native (Swift, Kotlin, React)

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a skilled Mobile App Developer to join our team.
	In this role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.
	You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to create high-quality, user-friendly apps that meet the needs of our clients and enhance user experience.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and maintain mobile applications for iOS and Android using [specific technologies, e.g., Swift, Kotlin, React Native].
	Collaborate with designers and product managers to define app features and user interfaces.
	Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code.
	Conduct unit testing and debugging to ensure app performance and reliability.
	Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies to implement best practices.
	Participate in code reviews to maintain code quality and share knowledge.
	Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
	Troubleshoot and resolve application issues in a timely manner.


Qualification / Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
	2 - 3 years of proven experience as a Mobile App Developer with a portfolio of released applications.
	Strong proficiency in programming languages e.g., Swift, Java, Kotlin, JavaScript.
	Experience with mobile app development frameworks and tools, such as [React Native, Kotlin, Swift].
	Familiarity with RESTful APIs and third-party libraries.
	Knowledge of UI/UX principles and best practices.
	Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
	Strong communication and teamwork abilities.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@polarisdigitech.net using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

2.) Customer Address Verifcation Agent 

Job Locations: Otukpo, Benue and Kano
Employment Type: Temporary

Job Description


	We are looking for agents within Bauchi, Gombe, Kano, Jigawa, who will carry out address verification for Banks and Fintech within their locations in each state.
	The ideal candidate must have an android phone and will have good knowledge of Google Maps.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an HND / NCE / Bachelor's Degree with 0-1 year of work experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@polarisdigitech.net using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Business Development Intern

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a self-driven Business Development Internwith a passion for relating with clients
	This role is responsible for identifying and developing new business opportunities for our mention specific area of IT solutions, e.g., cloud solutions, cybersecurity solution services, managed IT services .
	The ideal candidate will possess strong sales acumen, a basic understanding of the IT solutions.


Requirements


	B.Sc. Degree in Geography, Geoinformatics or Marketing or related field of study .
	Minimum of 1+ year in marketing or sales of IT Solution sales,
	Basci knowledge of IT solutionsand industry trends. Understanding common marketing platforms for IT services ( ERP, cloud based solutions) is a plus.
	Support in managing and executing social media marketing campaigns on platforms like LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram.
	Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
	Must a fast learner and self-driven.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@polarisdigitech.net using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

4.) Backend Developer - Java

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are looking to employ an experienced Backend developer who will be responsible for working on applications at the backend collaborating with other team members to build scalable applications for various sectors.


Responsibilities


	Participate in the entire application lifecycle, focusing on coding and debugging
	Write clean code to develop functional web applications
	Troubleshoot and debug applications
	Perform UI tests to optimize performance
	Manage cutting-edge technologies to improve legacy applications
	Collaborate with Front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic
	Gather and address technical and design requirements
	Provide training and support to internal teams
	Make use of and build reusable code and libraries for future use
	Liaise with developers, designers and system administrators to identify new features
	Follow emerging technologies


Qualification & Experience


	BSc. / HND in Computer Science or any related discipline
	Minimum of + 2 years of work experience in a similar capacity.


Core Technical Skills:
Programming Languages:
Proficiency in at least one backend language:


	JavaScript
	Java (Spring Boot).


API Development & Integration:


	RESTful API design and development
	Experience with GraphQL is a plus
	API documentation.


Database Management:


	Strong in SQL (PostgreSQL, MySQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB, Redis)
	Ability to design normalized schemas and optimize queries.


Authentication & Authorization:


	Implementing secure user authentication (JWT, OAuth2)
	Role-based access control (RBAC).


Version Control:


	Proficiency with Git and workflows (e.g., GitFlow)
	Experience with platforms like GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@polarisdigitech.net using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
